sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap' const AUTH_URL = "https://accounts.spotify.com/authorize?client_id=eab57081c0654ebfb1c55a4e599089d6&response_type=code&redirect_uri=http://localhost:3000&scope=%20user-read-email%20user-read-private%20user-library-read%20user-library-modify%20user-read-playback-state%20user-modify-playback-state%20playlist-modify-private%20playlist-read-private%20" export default function Login() { return Login With Spotify }
